price: Nítorí náà, ní òní apá kan yín kò ní ìkápá àǹfààní, kò sì ní ìkápá ìnira fún apá kan. A sì máa sọ fún àwọn tó ṣàbòsí pé: “Ẹ tọ́ ìyà Iná tí ẹ̀ ń pè ní irọ́ wò.”
arabic: فَٱلۡيَوۡمَ لَا يَمۡلِكُ بَعۡضُكُمۡ لِبَعۡضٖ نَّفۡعٗا وَلَا ضَرّٗا وَنَقُولُ لِلَّذِينَ ظَلَمُواْ ذُوقُواْ عَذَابَ ٱلنَّارِ ٱلَّتِي كُنتُم بِهَا تُكَذِّبُونَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: fal-yawma lā yamliku baʿḍukum libaʿḍin nafʿan walā ḍarran wanaqūlu lilladhīna ẓalamū dhūqū ʿadhāba al-nāri allatī kuntum bihā tukadhibūna
